{"contents":[{"name":"my_ojs_data","value":"[{\"func\":\"GaussSuppressDec\",\"pack\":\"GaussSuppression\",\"navn\":\"Cell suppression with synthetic decimal numbers\",\"description\":\"'GaussSuppressionFromData' is run and decimal numbers are added to output by a modified (for sparse matrix efficiency) version of 'SuppressDec'.\",\"keyword\":\"r konfidensialitet undertrykking 6.4\",\"url\":\"https://rdrr.io/cran/GaussSuppression/man/GaussSuppressDec.html\",\"pack_url\":\"https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/index.html\",\"språk\":\"r\",\"func_link\":\"GaussSuppressDec;https://rdrr.io/cran/GaussSuppression/man/GaussSuppressDec.html\",\"pack_link\":\"GaussSuppression;https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/index.html\"},{\"func\":\"GaussSuppressionFromData\",\"pack\":\"GaussSuppression\",\"navn\":\"Cell suppression from input data containing inner cells\",\"description\":\"Aggregates are generated followed by primary suppression followed by secondary suppression by Gaussian elimination by 'GaussSuppression'\",\"keyword\":\"r konfidensialitet undertrykking 6.4\",\"url\":\"https://rdrr.io/cran/GaussSuppression/man/GaussSuppressionFromData.html\",\"pack_url\":\"https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/index.html\",\"språk\":\"r\",\"func_link\":\"GaussSuppressionFromData;https://rdrr.io/cran/GaussSuppression/man/GaussSuppressionFromData.html\",\"pack_link\":\"GaussSuppression;https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/index.html\"},{\"func\":\"PLSroundingPublish\",\"pack\":\"SmallCountRounding\",\"navn\":\"PLS inspired rounding\",\"description\":\"Small count rounding of necessary inner cells are performed so that all small frequencies of cross-classifications to be published (publishable cells) are rounded. The publishable cells can be defined from a model formula, hierarchies or automatically from data.\",\"keyword\":\"r konfidensialitet avrunding 6.4\",\"url\":\"https://rdrr.io/cran/SmallCountRounding/man/PLSrounding.html\",\"pack_url\":\"https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/SmallCountRounding/index.html\",\"språk\":\"r\",\"func_link\":\"PLSroundingPublish;https://rdrr.io/cran/SmallCountRounding/man/PLSrounding.html\",\"pack_link\":\"SmallCountRounding;https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/SmallCountRounding/index.html\"},{\"func\":\"ProtectKostra\",\"pack\":\"Kostra\",\"navn\":\"Table suppression according to a frequency rule following the\",\"description\":\"Table suppression according to a frequency rule following the standards in the Kostra project.\",\"keyword\":\"r konfidensialitet undertrykking 6.4\",\"url\":\"https://rdrr.io/github/statisticsnorway/Kostra/man/ProtectKostra.html\",\"pack_url\":\"https://github.com/statisticsnorway/Kostra/\",\"språk\":\"r\",\"func_link\":\"ProtectKostra;https://rdrr.io/github/statisticsnorway/Kostra/man/ProtectKostra.html\",\"pack_link\":\"Kostra;https://github.com/statisticsnorway/Kostra/\"},{\"func\":\"ProtectTableData\",\"pack\":\"easySdcTable\",\"navn\":\"Easy interface to sdcTable: Table suppression according to a\",\"description\":\"'GaussSuppression', 'protectTable' or 'protect_linked_tables' is run with a data set as the only required input. One (stacked) or several (unstacked) input variables can hold cell counts. 'ProtectTableData' is a tidy wrapper function, which returns a single data frame instead of a list ('info' omitted).\",\"keyword\":\"r konfidensialitet undertrykking 6.4\",\"url\":\"https://rdrr.io/cran/easySdcTable/man/ProtectTable.html\",\"pack_url\":\"https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/easySdcTable/index.html\",\"språk\":\"r\",\"func_link\":\"ProtectTableData;https://rdrr.io/cran/easySdcTable/man/ProtectTable.html\",\"pack_link\":\"easySdcTable;https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/easySdcTable/index.html\"},{\"func\":\"SdcForetakPerson\",\"pack\":\"SdcForetakPerson\",\"navn\":\"Prikking av foretak og avrunding eller prikking av personer\",\"description\":\"Prikking av foretak og avrunding eller prikking av personer. Sett parameteren 'allowTotal' til 'TRUE' for at kategorier innen ('within') foretak skal prikkes samtidig som totalverdier over disse grupperingene tillates publisert.\",\"keyword\":\"r konfidensialitet undertrykking avrunding suppression from synthetic decimal numbers\",\"description\":\"Decimal numbers, as calculated by 'GaussSuppressDec', are used to decide suppression (whole numbers or not).
